بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم وما توفيقــي إلّا باللّه عليه توكّلت وهو رب العرش العظيم
هذا ما أصــدق نجيم بن حذوفة الواني زوجته ملكة ابنت حسين ولــپــواليّها الضّويديّ الصّيداويّ الصّفوديّ وهما يوميذ اجتمعوا بالـ
بصعيد مصر أصدقها صداق تزوّجها وتملّك به عصمتها و
دنانــير وازنة جيادا بالّذي ذهب به النّكاح وتبّت العڤده به ڤپل دحوله علپها واصاپپه اپاها
نقدها من ذلك دينارا وازنة نقدا بالجديد حــالّا معجّلا مقبوضا قبضت منذ منه ذلك وأخّرت ثمانية عليه دنانير إلى انقضا سنين مــتواليات أوّلهن سنة ثمانيــة
عشر وأربعمائة وسلّمهـــا إليه وعليه أن يتّقي اللّه العظيم فيها وتكون عنده في أمان اللّه وأمان نبيّه محمّد صلّى اللّه عليه وسلّم تسليما سلّــمت إليك بخير وحسن الــصّحبة بالمعروف
في صحّة عقولهما وأبدانهما وجواز أمورهمــا طائعين في الدّين راغبين غير مكرهين ولا مجبرين ولا مضطهدين
طيّبة بذلك نفسها نفسمها وذلك في العشر الأخير من رجب سنة ثلاث عشر وأربعمائة شهد على إقرار الولي والزّوج والشّاهدين جميعا الشّيخ

In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful, and my success is only with Allah, in Him do I trust, and He ist the Lord of the Mighty [Throne].
This is what Nûgeim son of Hadhûfah al-Wany has assigned as a dowry to his wife Malakah daughter of Hussein and her guardian, al-Dûaydy, and in that date they assembled in ....
[...] ........ in Upper Egypt. He has assigned to her in exchange for her marriage a dowry, and with it he holds her prevention and .......
[.......] dinars, full weight, good pieces in exchange of the marriage and of declaring that the marriage is valid, before going into and obtaining his enjoyment from her .....
[He paid cash down from this ... dinars] full weight, cash according to the new (standard), an immediate payment cash down, taken now and she has taken over in the same time and eight dinars, the reminder of her dowry are outstanding to his debit till the expiration of successive years reckoning from the year [four hundred and] eighteenth
[... and he gave her?] to him, and it is obligation in respect of her to fear Allah, the most High and to be in his home in the safety of Allah, and of His Prophet Muhammed - may the blessing of Allah be upon him and may He give peace, with full peace. She was given to you in good state, and to render relation with pleasure in kindness?]
[........ They, being in a state of (sound) mind, and] body, and [capable of transacting their business,] voluntarily according to the religious, willingly, without compulsion and not against their will, [and not under constrain]
[and with her consent she gave] herself, and this is in the last decade of Ragab of the year four hundred and thirteenth. [So-and-So] has testified to the acknowledgment
and Allah is sufficient as Witness.
They testified. He has testified to the acknowledgment of the trustee and the husband.
On behalf of her, Qunida Kubibah Eed al-Dil, [(the contract of marriage) has been written in thirteenth.
Abû Halîm ben Hîssein has testified to the acknowledgment of [the trustee and the husband.
On behalf of her] ... ben? Abdûn al-Sa[, (the contract of marriage has been written in thirteenth].
Abû Bakr ben Buʾthur has testified to [the acknowledgment of the trustee] and the husband.
On behalf of her, Abdou-Allah son of Hassan, (the contract of marriage) has been written in [thirteenth].
[So and So] has testified to the acknowledgment of [the trustee] and the husband.
Kasim ben Muhammed ben ʾAmer has testified to the acknowledgment of the trustee and the husband.
On behalf of her, 'Abdu-Allah ben Ahmed, (the contract of marriage) has been written in thirteenth.
ʿAbdel-Malîke ben Al-Omîr [has testified to the acknowledgment of the trustee and the husband.
] On behalf of her, ʿAthr ben Ahmed ben Hassan, (the contract of marriage) has been written in thirteenth.
] ben Thûmeira ben Bakr ben Swar [has testified to the acknowledgment of the trustee and the husband].

Mashāʾ Allah ben Bakr ben al-Guāz has testified [to the acknowledgment of the trustee and the husband].
